#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		int m, n;
		scanf("%d %d", &m, &n);
		int arr[m][n];
		int maxRow[m];
		for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)
		{
			maxRow[i] = 0;
			for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
			{
				scanf("%d", &arr[i][j]);
				if (arr[i][j] > maxRow[i])
					maxRow[i] = arr[i][j];
			}
		}
		int minCol[n];
		for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
		{
			minCol[j] = 10000000;
			for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)
			{
				if (arr[i][j] < minCol[j])
					minCol[j] = arr[i][j];
			}
		}
		int points;
		bool b = false;
		for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)
		{
			for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
			{
				if (maxRow[i] == arr[i][j] && minCol[j] == arr[i][j])
				{
					points = arr[i][j];
					b = true;
					break;
				}
			}
			if (b)
				break;
		}
		if (b)
			printf("%d\n", points);
		else
			printf("-1\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
